title: Toddler suffered fatal sexual assault after mother left her at motel with pal
text:
Nariah Brown was reportedly killed after a brutal sexual assault by Barron Spurlock, top right. The youngster’s stricken mother Aija Brown, bottom right, said she believed she was able to trust Spurlock with her child

A 17 month old girl suffered a fatal sexual assault after she was left in a hotel room with a man her mother trusted, police say.

Nariah Ivy Brown died of complications related to torso injuries two days after the attack at the Colony House Motor Lodge motel in Richmond, Virginia, on May 8.

Her alleged killer Barron Spurlock, 25, was charged with murder and object sexual penetration Monday, police said.

Spurlock is said to have struck after being asked to care for Nariah by the youngster’s mother Aija Brown.

Brown said she had known Spurlock for years, considered him to be a friend, and previously let him care for Nariah without incident.

Nariah suffered a horrific attack at this mote on May 8. She died two days later

The grieving mother told the Richmond Times-Dispatch how Nariah had been born prematurely, and her horror at having to bring the toddler back into hospital with the injuries that ultimately killed her.

Brown said: ‘When I held my daughter in my arms for the last time, I said, “Baby, I love you. And I’m going to let you go with Him.”

‘“I’ll be right behind you. I’ll be up there, and I’m going to hold you again.”’

Speaking shortly after her daughter’s death, Brown said: ‘I was gonna’ always do anything to protect her.

‘She never did anything to anybody. She wasn’t a mean baby.

‘She was loving. She would go up to strangers hug them and smile.’

Richmond Police Department Lieutenant Erland Marshall said his officers were called to a hospital where Nariah was being treated after the attack.

He called the investigation an ’emotionally trying one’ for his team, because of the younger’s age and the injuries she suffered.
description: Nariah Brown died of complication to an assault on her torso area in May, with her alleged killer Barron Spurlock charged with murder on Monday
